#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

double area(double *X, double *Y, int n) {
	double result = 0;
	int i = 0, j = n-1;

	for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {
		result  += (X[j]+X[i])*(Y[j]-Y[i]);
		j = i;
	}

	return result*0.5;
}

void test() {
	double X[20];
	double Y[20];

	int n; cin >> n;
	for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {
		cin >> X[i];
	}
	for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {
		cin >> Y[i];
	}

	cout << area(X, Y, n) << "\n";
}

int main() {
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin.tie(NULL);
	cout.setf(ios::fixed);
	cout.precision(1);

	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while(t-->0) {
		test();
	}
}
